The world’s first mobile network run by YouTubers

Brief

Drive sales of PAYG SIM cards amongst young, data-hungry people.

Solution

We created the EE Limited Edition project, which enabled influential YouTube ambassadors to create their own mobile network for their fans. Check out the film for the project here.

Results

Over 50,000 new customers in just 3 months and £millions in revenue for EE.
